meanings.definition: The act of producing something that is not genuine or authentic.
meanings.sent1: Her fakery in the art world was quickly exposed.
meanings.sent2: The magician's fakery amazed the audience.
meanings.sent3: His fakery of being a superhero was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The fakery of the online reviews was evident to everyone.
meanings.sent5: The fakery of the designer handbags was revealed by the experts.

meanings.definition: The practice of pretending to possess qualities or abilities that one does not actually have.
meanings.sent1: The politician's fakery fooled many voters.
meanings.sent2: Her fakery of being a skilled pianist was finally uncovered.
meanings.sent3: His fakery of being a famous actor was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The fakery of his confidence crumbled under pressure.
meanings.sent5: The fakery of his kindness was evident to those who knew him well.
